column2:
READ NOTES AT THE BOTTOM OF THIS PAGE BEFORE TRUSTING THIS INCOME OPTIMIZER Credits: jellyfish0839
Lab level taken from "Lab Calculator"-sheet. Manual override will work but break the reference.

column7:
What about Coin Bot?
Coin Bot has it's own separate cost (Medals), but I advise going for more Size than Bonus, try to keep it at 3 extra size levels than bonus.

column2:
Edit the green cells with your stats.
Blue cells will show your bonuses as they'll appear in the game.

In the right you'll see 3 tables.
Top One shows your current bonuses and the bonuses after one upgrade in many different things.
The Bottom two help you decide with one to invest first, considering fastest Lab or Stone Cost.

Bigger Value = Better
This is an experimental sheet based on the version 2.3.0 of the TC.
It brings changes to the income optimizer sheet.
It may contain mistakes since it's not finished.
It is aimed for players who have their black hole and golden tower synchronized with identical cooldown between 200 and 100 seconds and a BH duration 12 seconds shorter than their GT duration.
It is not relevant for you if these conditions are not exactly met.
It aims at fixing an issue with the original sheet that didn't take into account the BH cooldown and duration upgrade cost with stones that goes along with the GT cooldown and duration upgrades.
It also aims at adding the BH coin bonus lab in the next best time investment comparator.
Do not touch the purple cells.

Input the post-game stats from one (or the average of several) of your farming runs in the bright green cells (you don't need to write all the zeros, if it's 30b and 20b you just put 30 and 20, what matters is the ratio between both numbers)
